verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: has] made a lot of claims about gains in the coal industry , but virtually none of them are true .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] has [V: made] [ARG1: a lot of claims about gains in the coal industry] , but virtually none of them are true .
The Trump administration has made a lot of claims about gains in the coal industry , but [ARG1: virtually none of them] [V: are] [ARG2: true] .
